attributes.action: Award all Paramedics and Ambulance Staff with a pay rise backdated to April 2020
attributes.additional_details: During the worldwide pandemic Paramedics and Ambulance staff have been a vital key role in the service delivery of healthcare. As one of the most exposed key roles, Paramedics have cared for people without a second thought. A pay rise would be beneficial to financially help and support the staff who have put their patients before themselves. The risk to their life becoming greater with every shift attended. No one ever expects to need an ambulance. Please support us support you.
attributes.background: We want the government to include Paramedics and Ambulance staff who work within the NHS to be included in the pay rise. The ambulance service have worked tirelessly around the clock providing essential and life saving care to anyone and everyone throughout the COVID 19 outbreak.
